What to say when something that pleases.ARABIC_TEXT: ((كَانَ النَّبيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم إِذَا أَتَاهُ أَمْرٌ يَسُرُّهُ أَوْ يُسَرُّ بِهِ خَرَّ سَاجِداً شُكْراً لِلَّهِ تَبَارَكَ وَتَعَالَى)).
What to say when something that pleases.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (The Prophet PBUH would prostrate in gratitude to Allah upon receiving news which pleased him or which caused pleasure. )
